summary.span: 用作一些类的基类，这些类使服务器可以收集发出当前请求的浏览器的功能相关信息。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that enable the server to gather information about the capabilities of the browser that made the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个抽象类，包含相同的成员类。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 类使你能够创建类似的派生的类类，但你可以自定义并使用 ASP.NET 管道外部。The class enables you to create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 当执行单元测试时，通常使用派生的类以实现具有满足你测试的方案的自定义行为的成员。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing. 类是从 类派生的。The class derives from the class. 类用作包装器类。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在运行时，你通常使用的实例类来调用的成员对象。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to call members of the object.
